title: The Official Burrow vs. Tua Debate | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin Clark is joined by Danny Kelly to break down every aspect of the Joe Burrow vs. Tua Tagovailoa discussion, including the most NFL-translatable qualities each QB possesses, whether Tua would be drafted ahead of Burrow if he had never gotten hurt, Burrow’s legendary competitiveness, where Tua should land, and more.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
